A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Did Disney pay off the \"top critics\" or were they just all women? I'm sad to see my childhood dream raped and pillaged by Disney. I knew the Politically correct company would find ways to appeal to all audiences instead of evolving a great legacy helmed by George Lucas. Don't get me started on the Luke skywalker  character.....! Funny how all the good people were woman and all the bad guys were Men!
